.. _examples:

Examples
========

Here we catalog all the example Jupyter notebooks that have been created for
the various functionality contained in `cherab.lhd`.

EMC3
----
.. nbgallery::
    :glob:

    notebooks/emc3/*

Machine
--------
.. nbgallery::
    :glob:

    notebooks/machine/*

Observer
--------
.. nbgallery::
    :glob:

    notebooks/observer/*
